The video was originally shared on the F: Felicidad" on 22 May 2018, claiming to show a woman abandoning her son on the side of the road.
The video went viral and garnered over 2: 000 shares and 22 million views within a day of its posting.
However: the accompanying backstory provided in the Facebook post was found to be false. The incident actually took place in the Zhudong Township of Taiwan in early April 2018, where the woman quarreled with her child after he refused to leave a park during rain.
